## Getting Started

This code chunk performs three task:

- create a list of R packages needed.

```{r echo=TRUE, eval=TRUE}
packages <- c('sf','tidyverse')
for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}

```
